Package de.mycrocast.android.sdk.live.container

Interface LiveStreamContainer

All Superinterfaces:
de.mycrocast.android.sdk.observer.Observable<LiveStreamContainer.Observer>
public interface LiveStreamContainer extends de.mycrocast.android.sdk.observer.Observable<LiveStreamContainer.Observer>
The interface in handling the live stream and live stream updates. Implement and subscribe to the observer to receive updates for any changes related to any live stream.

This is used to receive: - New LiveStreams - Updates for LiveStreams - The end of a LiveStream
